values: 向下；向下方；朝下；向低处；向地面；由高向低；在下方；在下面；在低处；（坐）下；（躺）下；在纸上；往活动中心；在活动中心；向南方；在南方；向远处；离开学校；毕业；退学；（价格、数量等）处于低水平；处于较低位置；处于次要地位；降下；向下跌；减到更小；变小；变低；变淡；变稠；变得更弱；变弱；失利；落后；现付；从头到底；（咽）下；（吞）下；完全地；彻底地
（从高处）向下；往下；在…的下方；沿着…往下；沿；循；在…那一端；在…下游；<非正式>到；前往；…以来
在下方的；向下的；在低处的；降低的；低于正常水平的；悲哀的；沮丧的；情绪低落的；便宜的；低廉的；不活跃的；萧条的；落后于对手的；完成了的；已处理的；（计算机系统）停止操作的；停机的；不运转的；出故障的；完全掌握的；了解的；赞成的
下来；下去；下降；使掉落；击倒；迫使倒下；击败；被遗忘；被抑制；被吞下；（液体）一口咽下；（快速）吃掉；喝掉；合口味；使成死球
失败；挫折；倒霉；逆境；（婴儿头上的）软毛；汗毛；（小鸟的）羽绒；绒羽；绒毛；[美橄]进攻；进攻机会；10码进攻；（Down）当郡（北爱尔兰君名）；（the Downs）唐斯锚地

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 柔和的；绒毛的；多丘岗的

word_group.brief_definition: 传递下去；传承下去；传承
一上一下, 起伏；来来回回, 往返地；到处, 处处, 多变的
冷静下来；冷却下来；冷静
停止运转；出故障；失败；撞倒；打破；砸破（门）；消除；驱除（人与人之间的隔阂等）；（使）分解；（尤指在公共场合）禁不住哭出来；拆分，把…分成若干部分；抛锚；突遇车辆抛锚；决裂；中断；崩溃；失去控制；垮掉
下沉, 坠毁；被记录, 被记住；被咽下, 被吞下；引起某种反应；(完成学业后)离开大学(尤指牛津/剑桥)；(非正式)被捕入狱
触地得分；降落；着陆；触地得６分

bilingual.source: She looked down at and saw a kitten.
bilingual.target: 她向下看，看到了一只小猫。

bilingual.source: Use your mouse to scroll down the page.
bilingual.target: 使用你的鼠标滚动页面向下。

bilingual.source: She looked down from the top of the building.
bilingual.target: 她从建筑物的顶部向下看。

bilingual.source: He stood at the rim of the canyon, looking down.
bilingual.target: 他站在峡谷的边缘，向下看。

bilingual.source: She stood at the brim of the cliff, looking down.
bilingual.target: 她站在悬崖的边缘，向下看。

bilingual.source: He stood at the limbus of the cliff, looking down.
bilingual.target: 他站在悬崖的边缘，向下看。

bilingual.source: He looked down at the ground and found a coin.
bilingual.target: 他向下看，发现地上有一枚硬币。

bilingual.source: He is afraid to look down at because he has a fear of heights.
bilingual.target: 他害怕向下看，因为他恐高。

bilingual.source: Please don't look down at your phone, pay attention to the lecture.
bilingual.target: 请不要向下看你的手机，专心听讲。

bilingual.source: We stood at the top of the mountain and looked down at the beautiful scenery.
bilingual.target: 我们站在山顶向下看，风景很美。

list.abstract: Down（英 [daʊn]，美 [daʊn]），英语单词，作副词为向下；在下面；由强到弱等。作形容词为向…的下面；…以来等。短语搭配有Dorset Down（多塞特羊）。例句有“I looked down and saw a small withered flower lying in his hands.（我低下头，看见一朵枯萎的小花躺在他的手中。）”
Down 是来自英国的歌手Jay Sean于2009年5月31日在美国发行的一支单曲，收录于2009美国版专集My Own Way。

yingyinNormal.en: And then begin to manipulate the dough. Heel of the palm down, roll it up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后开始揉面，掌心向下揉，然后再卷进来。

yingyinNormal.en: Down on Lantau's western coast, lose yourself in the narrow lane ways of Tai O. This village has been home to fishing families for generations.
yingyinNormal.zh: 向下走到大屿山西岸，便可沿着狭窄的小径走入大澳。这个村庄是渔民世世代代的家。

yingyinNormal.en: Looking down upon the skyscrapers and apartment towers, you might wonder how so many people can live in such a tightly packed area.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从这儿向下望去，会看见多不胜数的摩天大厦和高耸的住宅，您会惊叹这么小的地方居然可以容纳着这么多人。

yingyinNormal.en: Everybody jump in! Swim down! That's it! What the...? Good work! Gill! Nemo! Shark-bait!
yingyinNormal.zh: 大家跳进来! 向下游! 就是这样! 怎么回事? 干得好! 吉哥! 尼莫! 鲨鱼饵!

yingyinNormal.en: She fell down, down, down, deep in a hole.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她一直往下掉呀掉，掉到一个洞里了。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, all right. Up, down, up, down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢，那好吧。上下，上下，上下。

yingyinNormal.en: Wait. No, no. Drag me down. Drag me down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，别这样，拖我下水…

yingyinNormal.en: You tell your men to stand down. Stand down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让你的手下把枪放下把枪放下。

yingyinNormal.en: And deep down, Maya is beautiful. Okay, calm down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而事实上，玛雅很美。好了，冷静一下。

yingyinNormal.en: You let me down, son.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你让我太失望了，孩子。

yingyinNormal.en: Put me down! Let me go!
yingyinNormal.zh: 放我下来！放我走！

yingyinNormal.en: Sit down if you want to.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你愿意的话可以坐下。

yingyinNormal.en: Down to the docks again?
yingyinNormal.zh: 又要去码头了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Get down when I tell you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我说趴下就赶快趴下。

yingyinNormal.en: So, system kinda broke down?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那套系统已经崩溃了？

yingyinNormal.en: Calm down. We'll figure it out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 冷静点，能解决的。

yingyinNormal.en: The tree? Yeah. Now come on down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 砍这棵树? 没错，快下来吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Please sit down Agent MacTaggert.
yingyinNormal.zh: 请坐，麦克塔戈特特工。

yingyinNormal.en: Then one day, I saw you set down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 突然有一天，你出现了。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, don't dumb this down for me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你可千万"别"简化来说给我听啊。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 减少; 减弱; 下降
沿着; 顺着; 朝着

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 负面；阴暗面；消极面
adv. 向下；适用于（某一等级制度下的或一群人中的）每一个人

word_family.mean: adv. 向下；在下面；由强到弱；由高到低；由响到轻；由好到坏；写下；记下；初付；付现；顺水；成死球

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 传递下去；传承下去；传承
停止运转；出故障；失败；打破；分解；禁不住哭出来
冷静下来；冷却下来；冷静
压制；强制；强行禁止；钳制；取缔
追捕；猎杀；搜索直至找到
拖累；压垮；压弯；使焦虑；使烦恼

sense_info_list.zh: 减少; 减弱; 下降

examination_example.sentence: Companies can also optimize their own energy use and cut <highlight>down</highlight> on the cost of electricity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公司也可以优化自己的能源使用，降低电力成本。

examination_example.sentence: Likewise, automation should eventually boost productivity, stimulate demand by driving <highlight>down</highlight> prices, and free workers from hard, boring work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 同样，自动化最终应该会提高生产率，通过压低价格来刺激需求，并将工人从艰苦、枯燥的工作中解放出来。

examination_example.sentence: Involuntary part-time employment is still far higher than before the recession, but it is <highlight>down</highlight> by 640,000 from its year ago level.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 非自愿兼职就业人数仍远高于经济衰退前，但比去年同期减少了64万人。

examination_example.sentence: slow <highlight>down</highlight> the traffic on their network
examination_example.sentence_trans: 减缓他们网络上的流量

examination_example.sentence: slows <highlight>down</highlight> babies' verbal development
examination_example.sentence_trans: 减缓婴儿的语言发展

examination_example.sentence: Knowing that mental health is always available and knowing to trust it allow us to slow <highlight>down</highlight> to the moment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 知道心理健康总是可获得的，并知道信任它，使我们能够放慢脚步，享受当下。

examination_example.sentence: They bought the seedlings and closed them <highlight>down</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们（大型公司）把“幼苗（创新型公司）”买过来，然后将后者关闭。

examination_example.sentence: In some cases, it is a part of a "buy and kill" tactic to simply close them <highlight>down</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在某些情况下，这是一种“买了就杀”策略的一部分，单纯为了关闭它们。

examination_example.sentence: First, they can shut things <highlight>down</highlight> without suffering much in the way of consequences.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首先，他们可以在不承担太多后果的情况下关闭一切。

sense_info_list.en: used to show the limits in a range or an order

examination_example.sentence: a top-<highlight>down</highlight> process
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自上而下的过程

examination_example.sentence: The virgin forest was a real treasure-house which extended from Maine all the way <highlight>down</highlight> to Georgia.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这片原始森林是一个真正的宝库，它从缅因州一直延伸至乔治亚州。

examination_example.sentence: This top-<highlight>down</highlight> conception of the fashion business couldn't be more out of date.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种自上而下的时尚概念已经过时了。

examination_example.sentence: Boiling <highlight>down</highlight> an individual's output to simple metrics, such as number of publications, entails considerable savings in time, energy and ambiguity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以作品发表数量等简单指标来概括个人成果，既省时省力，又能减少争议。

examination_example.sentence: Yet children appear to have it <highlight>down</highlight> to an art — and for the most part they don't need self-help books or therapy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，孩子们似乎已经把它归结为一门艺术——在大多数情况下，他们不需要自助书籍或治疗。

examination_example.sentence: But it is not just <highlight>down</highlight> to the government.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但这不仅仅归结于政府。

sense_info_list.en: to or at a lower place or position

examination_example.sentence: Reading becomes the default state from which you temporarily surface to take care of business, before dropping back <highlight>down</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阅读将会成为一种默认状态，在这种状态回落之前，你可以暂时集中注意力来处理事务。

examination_example.sentence: Even very young children tend to look <highlight>down</highlight> on the overweight, and teasing about body build has long been a problem in schools.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使很小的孩子也倾向于看不起超重的人，对身材的取笑一直是学校里的一个问题。

examination_example.sentence: Families don't sit <highlight>down</highlight> to eat together as frequently as before.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 家人不再像以前那样经常坐下来一起吃饭。

examination_example.sentence: Sit <highlight>down</highlight> to read and the flywheel of work-related thoughts keeps spinning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 坐下来阅读，而与工作相关的想法却像飞轮一样转个不停。

examination_example.sentence: Simply slowing the pace and talking in an even tone helps the other person cool <highlight>down</highlight> and does the same for you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只要放慢节奏，用平静的语气说话就能让对方冷静下来，对你也一样。

examination_example.sentence: If unable to calm <highlight>down</highlight> passengers, the railways may have to face a change of ownership.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果不能让乘客冷静下来，铁路公司可能不得不面临所有权的变更。

examination_example.sentence: If you're holding <highlight>down</highlight> a job to pay the bills, it's not easy to find the time to write.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你为了支付账单而保住了一份工作，那就不容易找到时间来写作。

examination_example.sentence: Hard times may hold you <highlight>down</highlight> at what usually seems like the most inopportune time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 困难时期可能总在最不合时宜的时候压制你。

sense_info_list.en: along; towards the direction in which you are facing
sense_info_list.zh: 沿着; 顺着; 朝着

examination_example.sentence: While animals in captivity deserve sympathy, zoos play a significant role in starting young people <highlight>down</highlight> the path of related sciences.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然被囚禁的动物值得同情，但动物园在引导年轻人走上相关科学的道路方面发挥着重要作用。

examination_example.sentence: When we travel <highlight>down</highlight> a well-known route, because we don't have to concentrate much, time seems to flow more quickly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们沿着一条众所周知的路线行进时，由于我们不必太集中注意力，时间似乎过得更快。

examination_example.sentence: Water bottles, and other trash litter the planet, because plastics are everywhere and don't break <highlight>down</highlight> easily.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 水瓶和其他垃圾遍布地球，因为塑料无处不在，而且不容易分解。

examination_example.sentence: Breaking <highlight>down</highlight> problems into bite-sized chunks and using code to solve them becomes normal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 把问题分解为多个小的问题，然后用代码解决这些小问题，这种方式成了常态。

examination_example.sentence: Many of us are weighed <highlight>down</highlight> by the past or anxious about the future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们中的许多人都为过去烦恼，或对未来焦虑。

examination_example.sentence: People who perceived greater social support were less likely to come <highlight>down</highlight> with a cold.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 感知到更多社会支持的人，患感冒的可能性更小。

examination_example.sentence: The question "what happens when the wind doesn't blow or the sun doesn't shine?" has provided a quick put-<highlight>down</highlight> for skeptics.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “当风不吹或太阳不亮时，会发生什么?”这个问题给了怀疑论者一个快速的下马威。

examination_example.sentence: A status gives federal officials greater regulatory power to crack <highlight>down</highlight> on threats.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一地位赋予联邦官员更大的监管权力来打击威胁。

examination_example.sentence: The crash of EgyptAir Flight 804, which terrorists may have <highlight>downed</highlight> over the Mediterranean Sea, provides another tragic reminder of why.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 埃及航空804号班机的坠毁，可能是被恐怖分子在地中海上击落的，它以悲剧的形式再次提醒我们为什么这么做。

examination_example.sentence: Losing a job is hurting: you don't skip <highlight>down</highlight> to the jobcentre with a song in your heart.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 失业是痛苦的：你不可能在心头哼着歌，跳着去就业中心。

examination_example.sentence: When he feels <highlight>down</highlight> — say, after giving a bad lecture — he grants himself permission to be human.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他情绪低落时——比如说，在做了一次糟糕的演讲之后——他宽慰自己这是人之常情。

examination_example.sentence: British land artists preferred to get away from towns, gravitating towards landscapes that are traditionally considered beautiful such as the Wiltshire <highlight>Downs</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国的地景艺术家更喜欢远离城镇，被传统上被认为美丽的风景所吸引，如威尔特郡丘陵地区。

examination_example.sentence: As the cost to everyone else has become clearer, politicians have begun to clamp <highlight>down</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着其他人付出的代价变得越来越明显，政客们已经开始钳制。

examination_example.sentence: Embarrassing scandals and the popularity of the republican left in the recent Euro-elections have forced him to eat his words and stand <highlight>down</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在最近的欧洲选举中，令人尴尬的丑闻和受欢迎的左翼共和党人迫使他收回自己的话并下台。

examination_example.sentence: Critically, another group was asked to spend a minute writing <highlight>down</highlight> reasons for their judgment, before giving the rating.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关键的是，在进行评分前，另一组被要求花一分钟的时间写下他们判断的理由。

examination_example.sentence: They would be employed in their later years even if they had enough money to settle <highlight>down</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使他们有足够的钱定居下来，他们也会在晚年被雇用。

examination_example.sentence: However, the mechanisms proposed were unwieldy and the Bill was voted <highlight>down</highlight> following the change in government later that year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，提议的机制很难操作，该法案在当年晚些时候政府更迭后被否决。

examination_example.sentence: People would be driven by beautiful wild creatures fascination to travel to wild areas to seek out disturb and even hunt them <highlight>down</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们会被美丽的野生动物的魅力所驱使，去野外寻找干扰，甚至猎杀它们。

word_usage.usage: 几个关于down的重要短语，put-down是俚语，名词“诽谤、侮辱、损人的刻薄话”。top-down则是形容词“自上而下的”。clamp down动词“压制”。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 下沉；坠毁；被记录；被记住；被咽下；被吞下；引起某种反应；(完成学业后)离开大学(尤指牛津/剑桥)；(非正式)被捕入狱
撞倒；击倒；(拍卖时)敲槌卖出
把...固定住；迫使...做出决定；确定；证实
向下滴流；涓滴；流淌下来

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 负面；阴暗面；消极面
adv. 向下；适用于（某一等级制度下的或一群人中的）每一个人
n. 倒计数；倒读数；最后时刻；最后时刻的工作；倒计时显示器

word_family.mean: adv. 向下；在下面；由强到弱；由高到低；由响到轻；由好到坏；写下；记下；初付；付现；顺水；成死球

examination_example.sentence: Amtrak says bookings are <highlight>down</highlight> 50 percent.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Amtrak表示，预定下降了50%。

examination_example.sentence: A number of factors are driving <highlight>down</highlight> the global oil prices not just for now but in the foreseeable future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不仅是目前，在可预见的未来，许多因素都在推动全球油价下跌。

examination_example.sentence: What does the author say helped bring <highlight>down</highlight> unemployment during the Great Depression?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作者说在大萧条期间是什么帮助降低了失业率？

examination_example.sentence: It was spoken code, never written <highlight>down</highlight>, and it was developed and used by Navajo Indians.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它是口语密码，从未写下来，它是由纳瓦霍印第安人发展和使用的。

examination_example.sentence: They could write <highlight>down</highlight> spoken codes promptly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们可以迅速写下口头代码。

examination_example.sentence: Anything, like numbers, names, places, have to be noted <highlight>down</highlight>, but the rest is never translated word for word.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 任何东西，如数字、姓名、地点，都必须记录下来，但其余的从不逐字翻译。

examination_example.sentence: This is <highlight>down</highlight> to "hereditarian" (遗传论的) science.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是由于“遗传”科学。

examination_example.sentence: The general consensus is that it mostly comes <highlight>down</highlight> to stress and reduced food consumption, not mental exhaustion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 普遍的共识是，这主要归因于压力和食物消耗的减少，而不是精神疲惫。

examination_example.sentence: Actually, it all comes <highlight>down</highlight> to a fairly simple question: What's so special about us?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，这一切都归结为一个相当简单的问题：我们有什么特别之处？

examination_example.sentence: It partly comes <highlight>down</highlight> to profit-driven business models that are built around low-wage work and part-time jobs that don't provide benefits.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这在一定程度上要归结为利润驱动的商业模式，这种模式建立在低工资工作和不提供福利的兼职工作的基础上。

sense_info_list.en: along the course or extent of

examination_example.sentence: We have a café & library upstairs and a ticket office <highlight>down</highlight> the hall, where you can buy tickets to all the major jazz concerts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们楼上有一个咖啡馆和图书馆，楼下有一个售票处，你可以在那里买到所有主要爵士乐音乐会的门票。

examination_example.sentence: The Portuguese took part in the trade, ferrying nuts <highlight>down</highlight> the coast along with other goods.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 葡萄牙人参与了贸易，沿着海岸运送坚果和其他货物。

examination_example.sentence: While the efforts are certainly not futile, the results of such bans will likely start to be seen by generations <highlight>down</highlight> the line.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然这些努力肯定不是徒劳的，但这些禁令的结果很可能只会在几代人之后才会开始看到。

examination_example.sentence: Should you find yourself on the receiving end of complaining, there's an ingenious way to shut it <highlight>down</highlight>—which is to agree with it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你发现自己是抱怨的接收者，有一个巧妙的方法来结束它——那就是赞同它。

examination_example.sentence: For example, dolphins, as well as other marine animals, shut <highlight>down</highlight> one hemisphere of the brain when they go to sleep.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，海豚和其他海洋动物在睡觉时关闭大脑的一个半球。

examination_example.sentence: Businesses have downsized or shut <highlight>down</highlight> across America, leaving fewer job opportunities for those in search of work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国各地的企业都在缩减规模或关闭，给那些正在寻找工作的人留下了更少的工作机会。

sense_info_list.en: made initially or on the spot

examination_example.sentence: Buy a home with a small <highlight>down</highlight> payment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 用少量的首付款买房。

examination_example.sentence: They have purchased a home with a small <highlight>down</highlight> payment and a 30-year mortgage.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们用少量首付和30年的抵押贷款买了一套房子。

examination_example.sentence: So it is not really your memory letting you <highlight>down</highlight>; just your ability to retrieve information from it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以这并不是说你的记忆里给你拖了后腿，而是你从脑海中获取已经存储了的信息的能力。

examination_example.sentence: Built-in mechanism allows us to cope with the ups and <highlight>downs</highlight> of our lives both physically and mentally.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 内在的机制让我们能够在身体和精神上应对生活的起伏。

word_usage.usage: down常作副词，但也可作介词、形容词、动词、名词，其中心词义为“下”。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 由高到低; 由大到小; 由强到弱

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 负面；阴暗面；消极面
adv. 向下；适用于（某一等级制度下的或一群人中的）每一个人
n. 倒计数；倒读数；最后时刻；最后时刻的工作；倒计时显示器

word_family.mean: adv. 向下；在下面；由强到弱；由高到低；由响到轻；由好到坏；写下；记下；初付；付现；顺水；成死球

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 冷静下来；冷却下来；冷静
触地得分；降落；着陆；触地得６分
容易地；易如反掌地；毋庸置疑地

examination_example.sentence: The pair went <highlight>down</highlight> the stairs quietly to the kitchen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 两人悄悄地下了楼梯，来到厨房。

examination_example.sentence: The woman's eye fell on the man's face, and she immediately looked <highlight>down</highlight> and adjusted her scarf.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 女人的目光落在男人的脸上，她立刻低下头，整理了一下围巾。

examination_example.sentence: Trainees learn about water-and-land-survival through designed tasks and their search and rescue of "<highlight>downed</highlight>" pilot.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过设计好的任务以及对“坠落”飞行员的搜索和救援，学员们了解水下和陆地的生存。

examination_example.sentence: You really ought to take a boat <highlight>down</highlight> the Amazon.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你真应该乘船沿亚马逊河而下。

examination_example.sentence: The tractor fired up and we were off, riding <highlight>down</highlight> the field looking for weeds to spray with chemicals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 拖拉机发动后，我们就出发了，沿着田野寻找可以喷洒化学药剂的杂草。

examination_example.sentence: I remember walking <highlight>down</highlight> the long hall and opening the door to my room to find an entire flock of seagulls.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我记得走过长长的大厅，打开我房间的门，发现了一大群海鸥。

sense_info_list.zh: 由高到低; 由大到小; 由强到弱

examination_example.sentence: Bring <highlight>down</highlight> the cost of labor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 降低劳动力成本。

examination_example.sentence: Discussing your issues and resolving them instead of stuffing them <highlight>down</highlight> can improve your emotional health.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 讨论并解决你的问题，而不是压抑它们，可以改善你的情绪健康。

examination_example.sentence: The stamp price has gone <highlight>down</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 邮票价格下跌了。

examination_example.sentence: "I'd then excuse myself to use the toilet, note <highlight>down</highlight> what the beggars said, and send the information to my teammates.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后我会找个借口去厕所，记下乞丐们说的话，然后把这些信息发给我的队友。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 一上一下；起伏；来来回回；往返地；到处；处处；多变的
停止运转；出故障；失败；撞倒；打破；砸破（门）；消除；驱除（人与人之间的隔阂等）；（使）分解；（尤指在公共场合）禁不住哭出来；拆分；把…分成若干部分；抛锚；突遇车辆抛锚；决裂；中断；崩溃；失去控制；垮掉
冷静下来；冷却下来；冷静
下沉；坠毁；被记录；被记住；被咽下；被吞下；引起某种反应；(完成学业后)离开大学(尤指牛津/剑桥)；(非正式)被捕入狱
下降；落下；倒塌；崩溃；被毁；流传下来；决定支持；大学毕业；渐由兴奋的感觉中平静清醒；涨潮；坠毁
撞倒；击倒；(拍卖时)敲槌卖出

穷困的；赤贫的；被击倒而无法继续比赛的；面临失败的
兴衰；沉浮；沧桑；高低；起伏
颠倒；倒转；一团糟；混乱不堪
权威性地发号施令；严令
下乡；赶上；减少；降低；缩减；耗尽；停止运转；衰退；衰弱；下降；破败

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 向下；适用于（某一等级制度下的或一群人中的）每一个人

word_family.mean: adv. 向下；在下面；由强到弱；由高到低；由响到轻；由好到坏；写下；记下；初付；付现；顺水；成死球

examination_example.sentence: Maybe you should sit <highlight>down</highlight> before you read this.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也许你应该在看这个之前坐下来。

examination_example.sentence: The windows and doors come from old buildings around her town that were pulled <highlight>down</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 窗户和门来自她城镇周围被拆掉的旧建筑。

examination_example.sentence: He looked <highlight>down</highlight> at the sand in the road．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他低头看着路上的沙子。

examination_example.sentence: Writing <highlight>down</highlight> or sharing your worries helps to get them out of your head.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 写下或分享你的担忧有助于你忘记它们。

examination_example.sentence: The wise man took out a piece of paper and drew a straight line <highlight>down</highlight> the middle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 智者拿出一张纸，在中间画了一条直线。

examination_example.sentence: The little girl liked the story so much that she asked him to write it <highlight>down</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 小女孩非常喜欢这个故事，她让他把它写下来。

examination_example.sentence: Your energy, attention and memory all go <highlight>down</highlight> when you don't sleep well.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你睡眠不好时，你的精力、注意力和记忆力都会下降。

examination_example.sentence: Loud voice can usually make the attacker calm <highlight>down</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大声说话通常能使攻击者平静下来。

examination_example.sentence: Our minds process a lot of information and time seems to slow <highlight>down</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的大脑在处理大量的信息，时间似乎变慢了。

examination_example.sentence: It takes centuries to break <highlight>down</highlight> (分解).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它需要几个世纪才能分解。

examination_example.sentence: Why are many students so easy to break <highlight>down</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么那么多学生这么容易崩溃？

examination_example.sentence: The team is now trying to make the enzyme break <highlight>down</highlight> PET in large quantities (大量地).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该团队现在正试图让这种酶大量分解PET。

examination_example.sentence: Didn't turn me <highlight>down</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有拒绝我。

examination_example.sentence: You are supposed to learn to turn <highlight>down</highlight> others' invitation politely.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你应该学会礼貌地拒绝别人的邀请。

examination_example.sentence: made him feel <highlight>down</highlight>
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让他感到情绪低落

examination_example.sentence: When I'm <highlight>down</highlight> or tired, I prefer movies that can cheer me up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我情绪低落或疲惫时，我更喜欢能让我振作起来的电影。

examination_example.sentence: Life is a long journey full of ups and <highlight>downs</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人生是一段充满跌宕起伏的漫长旅程。

examination_example.sentence: Well, for me it comes <highlight>down</highlight> to a perfect balance of delicious food, pleasant atmosphere（氛围）and a near perfect location.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 嗯，对我来说，这归结于美味的食物、宜人的氛围和近乎完美的地理位置的完美平衡。

word_usage.usage: down常作副词，但也可作介词、形容词、动词、名词，其中心词义为“下”。
